fields.followEntityOnStreamPost: Auto-follow record after posting in Stream
fields.followCreatedEntityTypeList: Auto-follow created records of specific entity types

tooltips.autoFollowEntityTypeList: Automatically follow ALL new records (created by any user) of the selected entity types. To be able to see information in the stream and receive notifications about all records in the system.
tooltips.followCreatedEntities: When creating new records, they will automatically be followed, even if assigned to a different user.
tooltips.followCreatedEntityTypeList: When creating new records of selected entity types, they will automatically be followed, even if assigned to a different user.
